name: A Very Illuminati Game
description:
This is the release candidate of the game. It's not completely done, but seeing as my laptop's hard drive decided to completely break as I was testing the final version of the game, this is what I have time to submit.

Controls:

A to move left, D to move right

Space to jump

Use the mouse to click on levels.

Start the game by clicking on the Illuminati symbol on the starting screen
